I didnt like number 2 very much. Im gonna get this to see if this would have made it better. In the first one they seemed to have fun but in this one it all felt like they didnt like doing the stunts at all. Ruined it for me anyway.
Christ people. Do you really need subs for a movie like this? All I see on PB is the nagging about subs. Learn english and enjoy movies without distractions.
